name: Danny Reed
title: President & CEO
description: He's the most experienced doctors of all the staffs at SmileMaker. Patients love him for his carefulness, humor and wisdom.

name: Lillie Riley
title: Vice President
description: His smile is the thing that patients admire the most. He said his dream is to make people obtain the best smile.

name: Pearl Wheeler
title: Customer Services
description: She has the ability to answer all questions with clear instructions, easy to follow her guide with great patience.

name: Theresa Cruz
title: Doctor
description: He makes people have a feeling that he's strict, but in fact, he's quite friendly and likes to small talk to patients.

name: Lena Clarke
title: Doctor
description: She graduated from Harvard University and had 5 years of working in dentistry. She's got a shrewd instinct.

name: Bertha Sherman
title: Doctor
description: She loves kids and has special talents when it comes to dealing with kids. Her major patients are kids, too.

name: Scott Colon
title: Doctor
description: Ladies love him not only because of his professional advice & etiquette but also because of his friendliness.

name: Dollie Horton
title: Doctor
description: She has been providing dental services at SmileMaker Clinic for 10 years now. She's considerate and professional.
